problem.markdown:
>>What is the name of the category of gases that trap infrared radiation in the atmosphere?<<
=greenhouse or= greenhouse gas or= green house or= green house gas or= greenhouse gases or= green house gases or= a greenhouse gas or= heat-trapping gas or= heat trapping gas or= heat-trapping gases or= heat trapping gases
[explanation] Greenhouse gas, sometimes referred to as heat-trapping gas, is the term given to gases that trap infrared radiation in the atmosphere (causing positive radiative forcing). [explanation]
